name: Denise ELBERSON v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ELWYN, INC.). Petition of Elwyn, Inc.
name_abbreviation: Elberson v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Denise ELBERSON v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ELWYN, INC.). Petition of Elwyn, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of March, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Petition for Supersedeas/Stay on Appeal are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
944 A.2d 752
Denise ELBERSON v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (ELWYN, INC.). Petition of Elwyn, Inc.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 18, 2008.
